column1: User:मुझे प्राप्त ऑर्डर पूरी तरह से खराब गुणवत्ता का है, मैं इस सेवा से बहुत निराश हूं और अपना ऑर्डर वापस करना चाहता हूं, इसके लिए चरण बताएं

Bot:I understand you are disappointed with the quality of your recent order. I apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. I can help you return your order and get a refund.

To initiate a return, please follow these steps:

1. Go to the "My Orders" page on our website.
2. Find the order you want to return and click "Return Item".
3. Select the reason for your return and follow the instructions on the screen.

You can also contact our customer service team for assistance with your return. They can be reached at [email protected] or by phone at [phone number].

Please note that you will need to provide your order number and the reason for your return when you contact customer service.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Additionally, if you would like to change your delivery time or payment method, please provide me with your order number and the changes you would like to make. I will be happy to assist you.
